snippet: Irina Finkel of Brooklyn, who made films as a young woman in Ukraine, has been disabled by a brain tumor and was helped by a beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation.
abstract: Metropolitan Council on Jewish Poverty, beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation of New York, one of seven organizations supported by New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Irina Finkel apply for Social Security Disability and Supplemental Nutritional Assistance Program and secures grant to pay her utilities bill.
lead_paragraph: Irina Finkel of Brooklyn, who made films as a young woman in Ukraine, has been disabled by a brain tumor and was helped by a beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation.

headline.main: A Resolve to Stay Young, Undimmed by Illness
headline.print_headline: A Resolve to Stay Young, Undimmed by Illness

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
